thread.title: GPrice

author: GPrice
title: GPrice
text: I was wary of selling books online, but, after looking through other websites and getting Quote: s, this company had the most positive reviews even though their Quote: wasn't as high as some of the others. I have no complaints: my shipping was paid for, and, once they got the books and processed everything (which did take a few weeks, mind you), I was promptly paid out. I would certainly try selling here in the future.
